lead_paragraph: Raj is a successful businessman, who has everything going for him, until Sonia, his ex-girlfriend (now the boss's wife), walks back into his life. When he refuses her advances, she accuses him of rape.
snippet: Raj is a successful businessman, who has everything going for him, until Sonia, his ex-girlfriend (now the boss's wife), walks back into his life. When he refuses her advances, she accuses him of rape.
